item.title: ‘P.I. Moms’ Was a Train Wreck for Lifetime. Now It’s a ‘Trainwreck’ on Netflix
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter tracked down filmmaker Phil Bowman to talk about the hit cable series that never was.
